TopicTitle: KSP.exe caused an access violation (Mod conflict?)

Articles.Content:
KSP keeps crashing just after loading to the main menu. I've tried launching with admin rights and removing read-only - Still crashes. Doesn't seem to be a problem with RAM either... Here's the error log: [http://pastebin.com/kvK0CaUd](http://pastebin.com/kvK0CaUd)

Mod list:

Planetshine

Astronomer's visual pack V2

Chatterer

TextureReplacer

Modulemanager

You have a 'stack corruption' error.. probably introduced by a mod.

Stack corruption occurs usualy when procedure parameters are not 'cleaned' off the stack before a procedure/object returns. The funny thing is that this should automatically handled by Dev packages during compilation... else it's a problem wrt mod development system differing from Squads dev kit.

Start with mod ellimination.

I'd suspect either AVP or Texturereplacer (or a combination of the two).

I run the other ones together with no problems.

Seeing as AVP is seriously outdated, I'd start removing that and see what happens. Updating your mods to the latest versions (if not already at them) is also a good idea.
Thanks to you two, I did the mod elimination and found out that AVP was causing the issue. Thanks!
glad to be able to help
